verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Now shalt thou see <WH7200> what I will do <WH6213> to Pharaoh <WH6547>: for by a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027> shall he let them go <WH7971>, and by a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027> shall he drive them out <WH1644> of his land <WH776>.
And God <WH430> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH3068>, I am Jehovah:
and I appeared <WH7200> unto Abraham <WH85>, unto Isaac <WH3327>, and unto Jacob <WH3290>, as God <WH410> Almighty <WH7706>; but by my name <WH8034> Jehovah <WH3068> I was not known to them <WH3045>.

And I have also established <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with them <WH5414>, to give them the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, the land <WH776> of their sojournings <WH4033>, wherein they sojourned <WH1481>.

And moreover I have heard <WH8085> the groaning <WH5009> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, whom <WH834> the Egyptians <WH4714> keep in bondage <WH5647>; and I have remembered <WH2142> my covenant <WH1285>.

Wherefore <WH3651> say <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, I am Jehovah <WH3068>, and I will bring <WH3318> you out from under the burdens <WH5450> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, and I will rid <WH5337> you out of their bondage <WH5656>, and I will redeem <WH1350> you with an outstretched <WH5186> arm <WH2220>, and with great <WH1419> judgments <WH8201>:

and I will take <WH3947> you to me for a people <WH5971>, and I will be to you a God <WH430>; and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, who bringeth <WH3318> you out from under the burdens <WH5450> of the Egyptians <WH4714>.

And I will bring <WH935> you in unto the land <WH776> which I sware <WH5375> to give <WH5414> to Abraham <WH85>, to Isaac <WH3327>, and to Jacob <WH3290>; and I will give <WH5414> it you for a heritage <WH4181>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

And Moses <WH4872> spake <WH1696> so unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: but they hearkened <WH8085> not unto Moses <WH4872> for anguish <WH7115> of spirit <WH7307>, and for cruel <WH7186> bondage <WH5656>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Go <WH935> in <WH1696>, speak unto Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, that he let the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> go out <WH7971> of his land <WH776>.

And Moses <WH4872> spake <WH1696> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Behold <WH1121>, the children of Israel <WH3478> have not hearkened <WH8085> unto me <WH6547>; how then shall Pharaoh hear <WH8085> me <WH589>, who am of uncircumcised <WH6189> lips <WH8193>?

And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> and unto Aaron <WH175>, and gave them a charge <WH6680> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and unto Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, to bring <WH3318> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

These are the heads <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>. The sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> the first-born <WH1060> of Israel <WH3478>: Hanoch <WH2585>, and Pallu <WH6396>, Hezron <WH2696>, and Carmi <WH3756>; these are the families <WH4940> of Reuben <WH7205>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095>: Jemuel <WH3223>, and Jamin <WH3226>, and Ohad <WH161>, and Jachin <WH3199>, and Zohar <WH6714>, and Shaul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of a Canaanitish woman <WH3669>; these are the families <WH4940> of Simeon <WH8095>.

And these are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> according to their generations <WH8435>: Gershon <WH1648>, and Kohath <WH6955>, and Merari <WH4847>; and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Levi <WH3878> were a hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>.
The sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648>: Libni <WH3845> and Shimei <WH8096>, according to their families <WH4940>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955>: Amram <WH6019>, and Izhar <WH3324>, and Hebron <WH2275>, and Uzziel <WH5816>; and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Kohath <WH6955> were a hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>: Mahli <WH4249> and Mushi <WH4187>. These are the families <WH4940> of the Levites <WH3878> according to their generations <WH8435>.

And Amram <WH6019> took <WH3947> him Jochebed <WH3115> his father <WH1733>'s sister to wife <WH802>; and she bare <WH3205> him Aaron <WH175> and Moses <WH4872>: and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Amram <WH6019> were a hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Izhar <WH3324>: Korah <WH7141>, and Nepheg <WH5298>, and Zichri <WH2147>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Uzziel <WH5816>: Mishael <WH4332>, and Elzaphan <WH469>, and Sithri <WH5644>.

And Aaron <WH175> took <WH3947> him Elisheba <WH472>, the daughter <WH1323> of Amminadab <WH5992>, the sister <WH269> of Nahshon <WH5177>, to wife <WH802>; and she bare <WH3205> him Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30>, Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar <WH385>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Korah <WH7141>: Assir <WH617>, and Elkanah <WH511>, and Abiasaph <WH23>; these are the families <WH4940> of the Korahites <WH7145>.

And Eleazar <WH499> Aaron <WH175>'s son <WH1121> took <WH3947> him one of the daughters <WH1323> of Putiel <WH6317> to wife <WH802>; and she bare <WH3205> him Phinehas <WH6372>. These are the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>' houses of the Levites <WH3881> according to their families <WH4940>.

These <WH1931> are that Aaron <WH175> and Moses <WH4872>, to whom <WH834> Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, Bring out <WH3318> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> according to their hosts <WH6635>.

These <WH1992> are they that spake <WH1696> to Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, to bring out <WH3318> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from Egypt <WH4714>: these are that Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>.
And it came to pass on the day <WH3117> when Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>,

that Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>, I am Jehovah <WH3068>: speak <WH1696> thou unto Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> all that I speak unto thee <WH1696>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, Behold <WH6189>, I am of uncircumcised lips <WH8193>, and how shall Pharaoh <WH6547> hearken unto me <WH8085>?
